headline.main: GERMANS COMFORT ITALIANS; Express Confidence That Nazi Arms Will Soon Repair Axis Military Prestige

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, March 1 -- The failure of the Roman god Mars to bring victory to the banners of the Fascist legions in Greece and North Africa was a subject which, excepting for the daily publication of Italian Army communiques, for many months simply was not discussed in the German press, on the radio or by the public speakers.
abstract: German press minimizes Ital defeats, says German arms will repair mil prestige

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
